readable.title: 3741462565_cc35966b7a
readable.content: A little girl wearing a pink shirt is sitting at the table and drinking a milkshake A small young girl in a pink shirt drinking a large chocolate milkshake . A young girl dressed in pink with a hair barrette pursing her lips at a big chocolate milkshake . A young girl is staring at a large milkshake in a glass . A young girl looks excitedly at a large milkshake .
